name: GO BACK TO HELL: Death is just the beginning
name_original: GO BACK TO HELL: Death is just the beginning
description:
Winner of Bristol Computer Science 2021 Gamejam People's Choice award.

This is an on-rails shooter contained completely within powerpoint.

The game originally kept track of a measure of health using macros and VBA scripts, however these had to be removed due to the University's security concerns. Also, you probably shouldn't be downloading dodgy VBA enabled files from random uncurated game websites.

Created in 16 hours.
